Class AdoptionRequestStorage

java.lang.Object
AdoptionRequestStorage
public class AdoptionRequestStorage extends Object
The AdoptionRequestStorage class is responsible for handling the storage and retrieval of adoption requests in the pet adoption system. It provides methods to save, load, add, and retrieve adoption requests using file-based storage.

This class uses serialization to persist adoption request data to a file and retrieve it when needed.

Key functionalities include:

  • Saving adoption requests to a file
  • Loading adoption requests from a file
  • Adding a new adoption request to the storage
  • Retrieving adoption requests by customer ID

      public AdoptionRequestStorage()

  • Method Details

    • saveRequests

      public static void saveRequests(List<AdoptionRequest> requests)
      Saves the list of adoption requests to the storage file.
      Parameters:
      requests - the List<AdoptionRequest> to be saved

    • loadRequests

      public static ArrayList<AdoptionRequest> loadRequests()
      Loads the list of adoption requests from the storage file. If the file does not exist or cannot be read, an empty list is returned.
      Returns:
      an ArrayList<AdoptionRequest> containing all adoption requests loaded from the file

    • addRequest

      public static void addRequest(AdoptionRequest request)
      Adds a new adoption request to the storage. The request is added to the existing list of adoption requests, and the updated list is saved to the file.
      Parameters:
      request - the AdoptionRequest object to be added

    • getRequestsByCustomerId

      public static List<AdoptionRequest> getRequestsByCustomerId(String customerId)
      Retrieves all adoption requests made by a specific customer.
      Parameters:
      customerId - the ID of the customer whose adoption requests are to be retrieved
      Returns:
      a List<AdoptionRequest> containing all adoption requests made by the specified customer
